titleStmt.title: To the supream authority of this nation, the Commons of England in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of the creditors of Sir Peter Temple, Knight and Baronet; whose names are hereunder written
titleStmt.author: Sanders, Thomas, fl. 1650.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Thomas Sanders [and 40 others].
Includes a list of the debts owed to the various petitioners.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
